name: Telecommunication content management
title: website
summary: In 2011, I began working on  this project freelance, i started with creating custom design, logo and template.
explain:
In 2011, I began working on  this project freelance, i started with creating custom design, logo and template.

this project goal was manage telecommunication systems, such as station data and different part of building and mast status, also ability save station location on google map and route of optical fiber.

The prominent part of this project is customize plan with javascript for draw shapes and structure in vector size.

Project features :

- Manage route and building and reporting

- Manage stations and  location on map (Google map API)

- Manage personnel

- Manage news

- Manage plans

- Manage site review

- Manage viewer
